caption: In a simple background, a muscular male with spiky hair and fiery horns is seen wearing a school uniform and a gakuran. He is hugging a brown-haired girl wearing a skirt and thigh-highs, with animal ears and cow horns. They have their heads together, cheek-to-cheek, and are smiling happily. The girl has a single tear rolling down her cheek, while the guy has a sweatdrop on his forehead. They are both wearing loafers and are standing on a patch of grass. The guy has thick eyebrows, a goatee, and forked eyebrows, while the girl has eye black and a happy aura around her. A black cat is sitting next to them, looking on. Chinese commentary can be seen in the background, and the scene is from the game Tokyo Afterschool Summoners, featuring the character Wakan Tanka and Master 2.

prompt: Write a complete and objective description for an anime illustration using all the given keywords: hololive, hololive indonesia, anya melfissa, kureiji ollie, pavolia reine, 3girls, smile, ankle boots, ankle ribbon, ankle strap, blonde hair, blue bow, blue dress, blue footwear, blue ribbon, blunt bangs, boots, bow, braid, brown hair, cleavage cutout, clothing cutout, colored tongue, copyright, crown braid, diamond-shaped pupils, diamond (shape), dress, earrings, fangs, flower braid, french braid, full body, gloves, gradient hair, green eyes, grey hair, grey skin, hair bow, hair ribbon, heterochromia, high heel boots, high heels, hkina7, holoro, index finger raised, jewelry, leg ribbon, long hair, looking at viewer, looped braids, low twintails, mismatched pupils, multicolored hair, multiple girls, own hands together, patchwork skin, pink hair, purple tongue, red eyes, redhead, ribbon, sandals, see-through, see-through sleeves, short sleeves, shoulder cutout, simple background, single braid, skirt hold, smile, standing, stitched arm, stitched face, stitched leg, stitches, streaked hair, swept bangs, symbol-shaped pupils, toeless footwear, twintails, two-tone dress, violet eyes, virtual youtuber, white background, white gloves, white hair, x-shaped pupils, yellow dress, yellow eyes, zombie, colored skin, official art
caption:
This official art depicts three virtual YouTubers from Hololive Indonesia: Anya Melfissa, Kureiji Ollie, and Pavolia Reine. The girls are standing and smiling at the viewer, with a simple white background behind them. Each girl has a unique hairstyle and outfit, with various blue, yellow, and green shades featured throughout. 

Anya Melfissa has long blonde hair with blunt bangs, looped braids, and a flower braid on one side. She wears a blue dress with a clothing cutout on the chest, ankle boots with ankle straps and ribbons, and blue earrings. 

Kureiji Ollie has two-tone hair with streaks of grey, green, and purple, swept bangs, and low twintails. She wears a yellow dress with a shoulder cutout and a see-through skirt hold, paired with toeless footwear and blue ankle ribbons. Her diamond-shaped pupils and fangs give her a zombie-like appearance. 

Pavolia Reine has long brown hair in a diamond braid with an ankle ribbon and a crown braid on top. She wears a short-sleeved blue dress with a cleavage cutout, leg ribbons, and ankle boots with ankle straps and bows. Her grey skin, violet eyes, and x-shaped pupils give her a unique appearance. 

All three girls wear white gloves and have various jewelry, including a blue bow and a hair ribbon with a symbol-shaped pendant. They also have unique features such as heterochromia, colored tongues, and patchwork skin. Additionally, there are stitched arms, legs, and faces visible on some of the girls, adding to their mysterious and unique appearance. 

Overall, this illustration features multiple girls with colorful hair and outfits, standing and smiling at the viewer with a simple white background. It showcases the diverse and creative designs found within the Hololive Indonesia community.

The illustration is high resolution and in absurdres quality, with attention to detail and intricate designs on the characters' clothing and weapons.

caption: In this scene, there is a single girl sitting in a wariza position while holding a paintbrush. She has long blonde hair and blue eyes, and is wearing a white sailor dress with puffy short sleeves and a blue sailor collar. She has a fox tail and fox ears, and is depicted as a fox girl. Her dress is accented with white thigh-high stockings and she has a white border surrounding her body. She is positioned against a simple green background with a white border. The girl is looking directly at the viewer with one eye closed and her tongue sticking out playfully. Her collarbone is visible, and she has a cowlick and an ahoge on her head. She has dark skin and is blushing slightly, with her mouth closed. This image is of high resolution and is an original creation by artist Manabe Mana.

caption: In a snowy landscape, a group of warriors are gathered around a bare tree. One girl, Lavian Windslet, stands at the forefront, wearing a breastplate and gloves with a helmet tucked under her arm. She has short blonde hair and piercing green eyes, and gazes directly at the viewer. Two boys stand close by, also in armor, while multiple other boys can be seen in the background. Snowflakes fall gently around them, and the wind causes the tree branches to wave slightly. The group appears to be preparing for battle, as evidenced by their uniforms and the tag "Sen no Kiseki: Northern War." One of the boys is identified as Satsuki (Chaosmode). The scene is depicted in the anime style of "Eiyuu Densetsu."
